content: I like the idea of categorizing and grouping similar items. I have a lot of baking supplies like flour, sugar, and baking powder that are all over the place. Do you think it would be a good idea to store them in a separate cabinet or on a specific shelf? And also, I was wondering if you have any tips on how to store my cookbooks. I have a lot of them and they're taking up a lot of space on my countertops.
